snippet: It might be time for another surgeon general’s report about the link between smoking and illness and death.
abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column notes this year is 50th anniversary of landmark surgeon general's warning on dangers of smoking; explores history of activists' battle linking smoking with related diseases against the interests of tobacco companies; argues current opposition to e-cigarettes, which some experts say may make smoking cigarettes obsolete, could mean it is time for another surgeon general's report.
lead_paragraph: It might be time for another surgeon general’s report about the link between smoking and illness and death.
